PHARMS

oxycodone

Modern humans must learn how to relate to psychoactives responsibly, treating them with respect and awareness, working to minimize harms and maximize benefits, and integrating use into a healthy, enjoyable, and productive life.

Oxycodone

Legal Status

by Erowid

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk appears toward the middle of the Erowid webpage dedicated to the legal status of oxycodone, following a section listing online book resources and organizational information. It introduces the specific topic of oxycodoneâ€™s legal status, immediately transitioning from general Erowid site features and support options to a focused discussion on psychoactive responsibility and legal details concerning oxycodone in the U.S. and internationally.

metadata.title: Erowid Oxycodone Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Oxycodone.

content:
Drug: Oxycodone | cid: 5284603
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Oxycodone.
Erowid name: oxycodone
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    Oxycodone

Legal Status

by Erowid

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #

Caution : All legal information should be verified through other sources. [see below]

U.S. FEDERAL LEGAL SUMMARY Oxycodone REGULATED Yes STATUS Scheduled SCHEDULE Schedule II CLASSIFICATION Opiate

Oxycodone is Schedule II in the United States. This means it is illegal to sell without a DEA license and illegal to buy or possess without a license or prescription. After high-dose oxycodone tablets as OxyContin were approved in 2005, the FDA revoked its approval of the original sustained-release formulation in 2010 because of the record of unapproved use. A re-engineered OxyContin product was released to try to make it harder to snort or inject and in April 2013, the FDA approved a newer formulation that is even harder to snort or inject. See http://www.fda.gov/NewsEvents/Newsroom/PressAnnouncements/ucm348252.htm.

INTERNATIONAL LAW #

Australia #


                    Context: 
                    This section provides detailed information about the legal status of oxycodone, including its classification, scheduling, and regulations under U.S. federal law, followed by a summary of its legal status in various international jurisdictions. It is part of a broader Erowid webpage that indexes information about psychoactive substances, including drugs, plants, and pharmaceuticals, with a focus on responsible use, health, law, and culture.

metadata.title: Erowid Oxycodone Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Oxycodone.

content:
Drug: Oxycodone | cid: 5284603
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Oxycodone.
Erowid name: oxycodone
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    INTERNATIONAL LAW #

Australia #

Oxycodone is a controlled drug in Australia and prescriptions must be recent (6? 12? months) to authorize current possession. (unconfirmed) (thanks JL)

Canada #

Oxycodone is schedule I in Canada. (Note: Canadian schedules are very different than U.S. schedules)

Germany #

Oxycodone is BTM Anlage 3 in Germany making it illegal to possess without a BTM prescription. (unconfirmed) (thanks PM)

U.K. #

Oxycodone is Schedule II/Class A in the U.K., making it illegal to buy or possess without a prescription.

If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #


                    Context: 
                    This section provides a summary of oxycodone's legal status in several countries outside the U.S.â€”including Australia, Canada, Germany, and the U.K.â€”as part of a broader document detailing the legal classification, regulations, and related cautions about oxycodone on the Erowid website. It follows the U.S. federal law summary and precedes general cautions and related resources.

                    Text: 
                    If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid legal information is a summary of data gathered from site visitors, government documents, websites, and other resources. We are not lawyers and can not guarantee the accuracy of the information provided here. We do our best to keep this information correct and up-to-date, but laws are complex and constantly changing. Laws may also vary from one jurisdiction to another (county, state, country, etc)...this list is not comprehensive.

RELATED RESOURCES #
